title: Nike Skateboarding's 360 Video: Behind The Scenes
description:
Go behind-the-scenes during production of our 360 video shoot and see how the unique camera works, plus get insight about what it was like to film with it from riders Paul Rodriguez, Justin Brock and Donovon Piscopo, along with Nike Skateboarding videographer Jason Hernandez. 

#skateeverydamnday

asset.title: Nike Skateboarding's 360 Video: Behind The Scenes
asset.description:
Go behind-the-scenes during production of our 360 video shoot and see how the unique camera works, plus get insight about what it was like to film with it from riders Paul Rodriguez, Justin Brock and Donovon Piscopo, along with Nike Skateboarding videographer Jason Hernandez. 

Peep the full 360 experience here: http://skateeverydamnday2.nikeskateboarding.com/en_US/video
